title: Interactive Exercise: Build a User Registration Validator
description:
Create a user registration validator that checks:
1. **Username:** 3-20 characters, alphanumeric only, not empty
2. **Email:** Valid format (contains @ and .)
3. **Age:** Integer between 13-120
4. **Password:** At least 8 characters

Return True if all valid, raise appropriate exceptions if any validation fails.

**Your task:**
Implement validate_registration() with comprehensive validation.
